the total stitch count including the i-cord sts at the end of the increase row please note that the last two increases are both worked at the left edge of the scarf end the increase section with row 128 you should have 37 sts on your needles 31 sts for the textured stitch pattern plus the 3 i-cord sts on each side if you decide to work fewer or more increases end the increase section after
